scripts.buildCommon: cd common && npm install && npm run build
scripts.buildFrontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.buildBackend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run buildCommon && concurrently npm:buildFrontend npm:buildBackend
scripts.devFrontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.devBackend: cd backend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev: npm run buildCommon && concurrently ---handle-input --default-input-target 1 npm:devBackend npm:devFrontend
scripts.docker: npm run build && docker build -f docker/Dockerfile . -t dynamitedanmultiplayer
